title: Preseaon ranked pointless?
body:
Even if you gain a bit of MMR per win cuz of the elo-reset, it would still be pretty pointless to "try-hard-get stressed out" in ranked because you would still lose so much MMR after the reset that you'd be in low tier anyways...

For example, My current MMR from lolking is 1933, but I will use 1800 for this demonstration.

1800 + 1200 (formula taken from other threads) =3000

Divide by 2 = 1500...this is like Gold 5. Even if you get to Diamonds or w/e, you'd still be in gold(maybe Gold 3-4) after reset.
